title.rendered: OUR FAVOURITE RED TONE FOR PAINTING AND DECORATING

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Our favourite red tone for painting and decorating” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%234c2c3d” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]Need a passionate, energetic and fiery red tone to brighten your residential and commercial space? At The Good Painter, we want to provide you with fun and enjoyable activities and project to keep you occupied while staying indoors. Our London painters and decorators wish to continue to inspire and give more ideas, tips and advice more than ever for your painting and decorating services. We saw how much you appreciated the last blog on brightening your space with our favourite shades of yellow, so we’re at it again! Need a motivating painting and decorating project to keep you distracted? Are you a massive fan of the colour red and it’s fiery characteristic? Here are our favourite energetic red tones for the painting and decorating of your home project![/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_custom_heading text=”Radicchio – Farrow & Ball” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%234c2c3d” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”5549″][vc_column_text]Farrow & Ball[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Radicchio is a modern and vibrant red, representing and reflecting the crimson leaves. This earthy tone provides a beautiful accent colour when painting your residential dream space, as well as being a beautiful tone within decorating, for example, painting furniture and creating accent walls. This red paint colour is ideal for a contemporary look and design, especially paired with a warm, neutral colour palette.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Caliente – Benjamin Moore” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%234c2c3d” use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.benjaminmoore.com%2Fen-us%2Fcolor-overview%2Ffind-your-color%2Fcolor%2F2055-30%2Fcaribbean-blue-water%3Fcolor%3D2055-30||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”5550″][vc_column_text]House Beautiful[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Want to create a statement dining room or living area? This beautiful rich tone from Benjamin Moore provides the right amount of sophistication and luxury when painting and decorating. Soft enough to use and paint your whole room, but striking enough to wow any guest when arriving. This red paint colour can work perfectly with crisp white or bright colours, or create an atmospheric setting with darker hues. It’s name ‘Caliente’ truly reflects the atmosphere it provides![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Bronze Red – Little Greene” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%234c2c3d” use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.littlegreene.com%2Fpaint%2Fcollection%2Fblue%2Fmoons||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”5551″][vc_column_text]Little Greene[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”5552″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]If you are achieving the ‘Eclectic Glamour’ look and need a mix of red to add to your colour scheme, Little Greene’s Bronze Red is a shade to die for within painting and decorating! Our residential painters and decorators believe this shade works anywhere and allows itself to speak when used in a living room or reception. Our painting and decorating team loves its bronze undertone and find it works exceptionally well when painting wall panelling.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Salsa Red – Dulux UK” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%234c2c3d” use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.littlegreene.com%2Fpaint%2Fcollection%2Fblue%2Fmoons||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”5553″][vc_column_text]Dulux[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Salsa Red is a rich, vibrant and majestic tone which will add spice to any residential interior space, as suggested by the name. This deep tone, with the resemblance to the shade chilli, is a red tone which is designed to impress and transmit a powerful statement in whatever room located. Why not combine it with the neutral tone ‘Scent Bottle’? This would work flawlessly in a bedroom looking to achieve energy and motivation!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Blazer – Farrow & Ball” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%234c2c3d” use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.littlegreene.com%2Fpaint%2Fcollection%2Fblue%2Fmoons||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”5554″][vc_column_text]Farrow & Ball[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”5555″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Are you looking for a red which is closer to an orange tone? Farrow & Ball’s brilliant Blazer is the comforting red paint colour you seek, which is rich and soft. Create a regal and cheerful space by adding this terracotta hue to a living area with a fireplace, or highlighting furnishings with the pop of colour. Our painters and decorators confirm this is a popular choice when it comes to residential painting and decorating.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Bull’s eye red – Benjamin Moore” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%234c2c3d” use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.littlegreene.com%2Fpaint%2Fcollection%2Fblue%2Fmoons||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”5556″][vc_column_text]Benjamin Moore[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]If you require an intense shade, nothing screams high-spirits and vibrancy as Benjamin Moore’s Bull’s Eye Red. This dominant and powerful painting and decorating colour are sure to be the statement tone when used in architectural details to create a focal point within your London home. Our residential painters and decorators encourage anyone to use this shade when wanting the room to stand out and add a punch to the space; it is named Bull’s eye Red for a reason?[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Rectory Red – Farrow & Ball” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%234c2c3d” use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.littlegreene.com%2Fpaint%2Fcollection%2Fblue%2Fmoons||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”5557″][vc_column_text]Farrow & Ball[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”5558″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Our residential painting and decorating team couldn’t leave without mentioning Rectory Red, a red which radiates sophistication and warmth to the cosiness of your interior and home. The definition of a warm welcoming defines this red paint colour, as it intensifies small spaces, and adds excellent statements to large ones. Residential painting and decorating companies have seen the recommendations of this shade, and we agree it should be one to add to the list.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Our residential painters and decorators are here to inspire, advise and be at your service even during this time. As a painting and decorating company in London, we want to ensure our services are running in the same high-quality, prioritising the health and safety of our clients and workers, and following the correct procedures to continue renovating and transforming your home, especially during this time. If you’d like more information on our services, contact us now and make sure to take advantage of our special offer to make your home into your relaxing sanctuary.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
